column4: Ah for pete's sake! Can someone tell me why firefox just overrides all sound on my system? MPD won't play while firefox with a flash video in it is still about. Even if I close the tab, alsa won't play anything. I have to close firefox entirely...
delicate balance of audio power, oss, alsa, esd
If I could answer your firefox/flash audio problem, I could solve the world peace crisis
